name: Smart Food Ordering
template:
customize :
{Dish} = enter_your_dish
{Restaurant} = enter_restaurant
{App} = any

Goal : Order {Dish} from {Restaurant} using {App}.

Comparison Logic:
1. If {Restaurant} is "enter_restaurant": Do not select the first result. Scroll and browse through at least 5-8 different restaurants serving {Dish}. Compare their Ratings vs. Price. Select the "Best Value" option (highest rating for the lowest relative price).
2. If {App} is "any": Quickly check available delivery apps. Choose the one with the lowest total checkout price (including delivery fee) for the selected item.
3. If {Dish} is "enter_your_dish": Browse the "Bestsellers" or "Recommended" category and pick the item with the highest number of positive reviews.

Final Action: Add the best value item to cart and stop at the payment screen.
